name: SCP:Dangerous Facility
description:
//SCPOS v 1.0 DESCRIPTION: SCP:DANGEROUS FACILITY ACCESS GRANTED

SCP:Dangerous Facility is a multiplayer role playing game that takes places in the future, where in one of the SCP's foundation laboratories all dangerous anomalies are escaping their own containment chambers.
Player can take a role of an MTF Guard, Class D, Chaos Insurgency Agent and much more!
